election_record.label: South Carolina 1811 State Senate, Saint Matthew Parish, Special

overview.note: Voter List has 109 names; votes for candidates not given.
Special Election caused by the break up of the old Senatorial District.

Biographical Directory of the South Carolina Senate lists James MisCampbell as the candidate elected to represent the new district, however his death on October 7, 1811 led to a new election. William Caldwell was elected to replace James MisCampbell, and qualified on November 29, 1811.

election_record.reference: Original Poll Sheet. South Carolina Department of Archives and History, Columbia.
Biographical Directory of the South Carolina State Senate. Vol. 3. 1837.
